FuncDef: This command specifies the route target(s) to be accepted from or advertised to peers. If theroute-target-listis a non-null list, only routes with one or more of the given route targets are accepted from or advertised to peers.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to 15 route target communities. Values-[target: {ip-address:comm-val | 2byte-asnumber:ext-comm-val | 4byte-asnumber:comm-val}.
